name: omnitools
description: Omni Tools is a lightweight toolbox web app offering JSON viewer, URL encoder, image compressor, and more utilities for developers or productivity enthusiasts in a self-hosted environment.
features: Developer Utilities: Collection of essential tools including JSON formatter, URL encoder, hash generators, and text converters.
Image Processing: Compress, resize, and convert images between formats with quality controls and batch processing.
Text Tools: Format, validate, and transform text with regex testing, case conversion, and encoding utilities.
Code Formatters: Beautify and minify code in multiple languages including JSON, XML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Hash Generators: Create MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, and other cryptographic hashes for security and verification purposes.
Base64 Encoding: Encode and decode Base64 strings with support for files and text content.
QR Code Generator: Create customizable QR codes with different sizes, error correction levels, and output formats.
Color Utilities: Convert between color formats, generate palettes, and extract colors from images.
Password Generator: Create secure passwords with customizable length, character sets, and complexity requirements.
Timestamp Converter: Convert between different timestamp formats and time zones with human-readable output.
URL Utilities: Encode, decode, and parse URLs with parameter extraction and validation features.
Lightweight Interface: Fast, responsive web interface that works offline without external dependencies or tracking.
